alert.note: Alert for Boone; Campbell; Gallatin; Kenton (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:59AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF OHIO, NORTHEASTERN SWITZERLAND, KENTON, SOUTHERN CAMPBELL, BOONE AND EASTERN GALLATIN COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 559 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Rising Sun, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Florence, Independence, Erlanger, Edgewood, Alexandria, Elsmere, Fort Mitchell, Villa Hills, Highland Heights, Taylor Mill, Fort Wright, Crescent Springs, Walton, Crestview Hills, Park Hills, Lakeside Park, Rising Sun, Oakbrook and Burlington. This includes the following Interstates... I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 71 and 77. I-75 in Kentucky between mile markers 169 and 190. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
